Module slogo_team01
Package view.selector.features.variabletextfeature

Class VariableTextFeature

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.selector.features.variabletextfeature.VariableTextFeature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LanguageChangeObserver, Feature
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandHistory, UserCommands
    public abstract class VariableTextFeature
extends java.lang.Object
implements Feature, LanguageChangeObserver
    Abstract class representing panes containing dynamically changing text that can be dynamically translated. Implements Feature and LanguageChangeObserver separately for encapsulation, ensuring that different methods can be made available to different objects.
    Author:
    Goh Khian Wei, Ben Lawrence
